home.subtitle: Extended components for shadcn-vue
home.hero_description:
A collection of extended components for shadcn-vue.
Copy the code and use it immediately.
home.why_description: Designed for modern Vue applications to make development more efficient.

rich_components.title: Rich Components
rich_components.description: High-quality component library based on shadcn-vue extensions, ready to use out of the box.

source_visible.title: Source Visible
source_visible.description: All component source code is completely open and can be directly copied into the project for use.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Perfectly adapted to various screen sizes, providing an excellent mobile experience.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Follows WAI-ARIA standards to ensure all users can use it.

theme_toggle.title: Theme Toggle
theme_toggle.description: Built-in dark mode support, switch theme styles as you like.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: Complete type definitions provide a better development experience.

quick_start.title: Quick Start
quick_start.description: Integrate components into your project in three steps

1.title: Browse Components
1.description: Find the components you need in the library

2.title: Copy Code
2.description: Copy the component source code directly into your project

3.title: Start Using
3.description: Customize and use components as needed

footer.description:
Extended component library for shadcn-vue
Built for modern Vue applications
footer.copyright: Built with Nuxt & shadcn-vue. Use MIT License. Source code available on GitHub.
